mapper.select: select violation_no as violationNo, user_no as userNo, item, date, time, car_Num as carNum, spot, address, contents, video_url as videoUrl from violation where violation_no=#{violationNo} AND user_no=#{userNo}
select violation_no as violationNo, user_no as userNo, item, date, time, carNum, spot, address, contents, videoUrl from violation where user_no=#{userNo}
mapper.insert: insert into violation(user_no, item, date, time, car_num, spot, address, contents, video_url) values(#{userNo}, #{item}, #{date}, #{time}, #{carNum}, #{spot}, #{address}, #{contents}, #{videoUrl})
